concept.title: Instructor Information
concept.shortdesc: Students need instructor information to know who the instructor is and how to reach them.

conbody.p:
The relevant instructor information includes:
Instructor name
Office location and contact information
Office hours (which you can facilitate through a chat tool such as Skype)
